content: doll kiddo cap finished size black hat 3 ½ inches tall 13 inch brim diameter white hat 3 ¾ inches tall 14 inch brim diameter yarn the yarn was from the stash and i no longer had the label from the white yarn but i am pretty sure it was pompador by red heart this is a baby weight yarn the black yarn is lanett by sandnes garn a sock weight yarn in color 1088 black 50gr = 195 meter based on the weight of the hats 3oz/10g about 40meters of yarn is needed per hat hook size h notions yarn needle ½ inch ribbon 24 inches long gauge black yarn - 18 sts and 24 row = 4 inches in single_crochet white yarn -17 sts and 22 row = 4 inches in single_crochet pattern chain 4 slip_stitch in first chain to form ring round 1 chain 2 work 5 single_crochet in ring slip_stitch in top chain of chain 2 to join round 5 single_crochet round 2 chain 2 work 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet *single_crochet in next single_crochet work 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet * repeat between * once more slip_stitch in top chain of chain 2 to join round 8 single_crochet round 3 chain 2 *work 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet * repeat between * 3 more times slip_stitch in top chain of chain 2 to join round 12 single_crochet round 4 chain 2 *work 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet * repeat between * 5 more times slip_stitch in top chain of chain 2 to join round 18 single_crochet round 5 chain 2 *work 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet * repeat between * 8 more times slip_stitch in top chain of chain 2 to join round 27 single_crochet round 6 chain 2 *work 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet * repeat between * 8 more times slip_stitch in top chain of chain 2 to join round 36 single_crochet round 7 chain 2 *work 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet * repeat between * 8 more times slip_stitch in top chain of chain 2 to join round 45 single_crochet round 8 chain 2 *work 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet * repeat between * 8 more times slip_stitch in top chain of chain 2 to join round 54 single_crochet round 9 chain 2 *work 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 8 single_crochet * repeat between * 5 more times slip_stitch in top chain of chain 2 to join round 60 single_crochet round 10 16 chain 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet and in each single_crochet around slip_stitch in top chain of chain 2 to join round 60 single_crochet round 17 chain 4 double_crochet in 2nd single_crochet from chain * chain 1 skip 1 single_crochet and double_crochet in next single_crochet* repeat between * forming 30 chain 1 spaces slip_stitch in 3rd chain of chain 4
